Posts.Content: Oct 10, 2013 06:34PM Connie95Abroad wrote: Recently diagnosed at (I don't reveal my age, ha ha!, but in your ballpark) with bone mets and 6 months (just this June) after that with liver mets. I have four children aged 7 and under. Completely identify with the anxiety over this. Would never have had children if I'd realized I might leave them without their mother. Not sure I would have married either. But I'm encouraged to read that so many are surviving mBC for longer periods of time.
Posts.Title: liver mets - are you out there? Huntsco Mamita49
